name: We Love Food
tagline: Because, you know, we all love food
body:
### Project goal
This project has one, very humble goal. To help people find places to eat and to avoid places that aren't so great.

Initially, the focus and scope is focussed on the wonderful city of Bath, but that will grow over time and will hopefully allow anyone to setup information about their local area.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
